CustomField.description:
Stores the information related to the Moment creation source.
In System Use: 'Case - Handoff Button'; 'Contact - After Save Automations'; 'Koala Intent Signal - After Save Automations'; 'Moment: After Save Automations'; 'Moment: Before Save Automations'; 'Retool User - After Save Automations'; 'Task - After Save Automations'
External Systems Utilization: Champify; Hubspot; Koala; Madkudu; Regie.ai
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Stores the information related to the Moment creation source.
CustomField.label: Moment Context
